title: Create Your Project & Record Complete Feature Flow
description: Install Chrome Extension with clickable link to Chrome Web Store. Create new project requirements (recording name, app URL, description). Follow detailed recording guidelines with checkmarks for comprehensive coverage.
subSteps: Install Chrome Extension with clickable link to Chrome Web Store
Create new project requirements (recording name, app URL, description)
Detailed recording guidelines with checkmarks:
✅ Click on ALL necessary fields (required and optional)
✅ Fill out forms completely
✅ Navigate through entire user journey
✅ Include success/error scenarios
✅ Interact with all UI elements
codeExample: # Pro tip callout box: "The more complete your recording, the better AI can understand your app and generate comprehensive test cases"

title: AI Analyzes Your Recording
description: AutoTester's AI engine analyzes your recorded interactions to understand your application's behavior, UI patterns, and user workflows.
subSteps: AI processes your recorded user interactions
Identifies form fields, buttons, and navigation patterns
Maps out user workflows and business logic
Detects validation rules and error scenarios
Understands application structure and dependencies

title: Generate Comprehensive Test Cases
description: Based on your recording, AutoTester generates multiple test scenarios covering positive cases, edge cases, and error conditions.
subSteps: AI generates positive test cases for happy paths
Creates edge case scenarios for boundary testing
Generates error condition tests for validation
Produces accessibility and usability tests
Creates performance and load test suggestions

title: Review & Execute Tests
description: Review the generated test cases, customize as needed, and execute them to validate your application's functionality.
subSteps: Review AI-generated test cases and scenarios
Customize test parameters and expected outcomes
Execute tests individually or as a complete suite
Analyze test results and failure reports
Schedule automated test runs for continuous testing
